text: Fantômas (also spelled as Fantomas) is an American heavy metal supergroup formed in 1998 in California. It has vocalist Mike Patton, drummer Dave Lombardo, guitarist Buzz Osborne and bassist Trevor Dunn. The band is named after Fantômas, a crime fiction character from France. == Discography == === Studio albums === 1999 - Fantômas 2001 - The Director's Cut 2004 - Delìrium Còrdia 2005 - Suspended Animation == References == Category:Musical groups established in 1998 Category:American heavy metal bands Category:1990s music groups Category:2000s music groups Category:2010s music groups Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2017
title: Fantômas (band)
